CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 9, 1961, pg. 18, reads: "Will He Star Too? Posing here is Mark Harris, 2-year-old son of Mr. and Mrs. Charles Harris of Butler.  He is the grandson of The Courier's veteran photographer, 'Teenie' Harris, who, in his younger years, was a great basketball star.  Will Mark excel at baseball as well as did his grandad, on a cage court?"
TitMainTitle: Mark Harris holding baseball bat, neighbor Steve Lehners catching, and Charles A. Harris Jr. pitching, with Cheryl "Tiny" Harris in background, at Charles A. Harris' house in Butler, Pennsylvania
